segments.text: Can you help me figure out how to use this vending machine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would be happy to help . What do you want to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy that candy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . So this machine will make change if you need it . Do you have your dollars ready ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next , you feed your dollars into the machine in the slot . Make sure they are smooth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure you know that if the dollar gets stuck , you might have to re-feed it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now you just make your selection and pray . If nothing comes out , try again or call the number on the side of the machine .
segments.speaker: S2
